title: Construction of a New Building Complex for the Ministry of Health
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the contract for the construction of a new ten (10) storied building complex for the Ministry of Health in Colombo at a cost of Rs.3,896,553,840.00, to Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau (CECB), with the view to accommodating all units under the Ministry of Health in the said building complex was approved by the Cabinet.
